yasuo is an alpha male who cuts idiots up and makes big dick plays

> [{quoted}](name=Malicious Metal,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EG5HLloi,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-08T22:45:20.668+0000)
>
> We don't want him in hell either
> Cheers
> -Satan, Beelzebub, Samael, Lucifer and Co

Wait. Aren't Satan and Lucifer the same person?

Technically speaking, Lucifer refering to Satan is just a mistranslation in the King James Bible of a Hebrew word that only appears once in the Hebrew bible (Heylel). The word itself refers the the planet Venus.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/42/4263477fa90e6c8502d40a9c5eb18075daf5c221aa3531c3dc690f7737f9afeb.jpg
Ding ding ding, and we have a winner folks!

> [{quoted}](name=PTZekrom69,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=EG5HLloi,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-08-08T23:22:43.125+0000)
>
> Wait. Aren't Satan and Lucifer the same person?

Wouldn't call him a person, but yes they refer to the same entity.

Nope satan is the accuser: an angel who wishes to show god humans are imperfect and evil, like in the book of job.
Lucifer the morning star: on the other hand was an angel who was cast out of heaven for his sins of pride and arrogance.
So 4 of the Lords of Hell do not want Yasuo there, but Teemo is ok with him? I'd say you guys are overruled.

-Sam, and Dean
Oh wait, they got out again.
